title: Hopes of earnings revival lift Indian tech firms’ valuations
description: Analysts say despite subdued revenue growth across the $250 bn Indian IT industry, valuations are getting a heft from an anticipated revival in demand in key clientele regions – the US and Europe. Expected business revival, deal wins and focus on margin improvement in the past 2-3 quarters has further pushed up the momentum.
content: Valuations of Indian IT companies have swelled nearly 20% in the past three months with the top three firms Tata Consultancy Services, Infosys and HCLTech giving returns of 13%, 26% and 22%, respectively.
